title: Quality Phone, Worked out of the box perfectly, Arrived ahead of schedule
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: The phone was exactly ad advertised. No battery, screen, or body conditions issues. Slide the SIM in and worked right away. Absolutely best iPhone purchase i've made thus far. Very happy with my refurb. The only qualm is that it cam with an off brand changer that doesnt seem to charge as quickly. That is not a problem as I have my own cables and bricks. 100% will buy again in the future when I need another new iPhone. Thank you!
author: Cindy S Hartman
Split_4: Absolutely best iPhone purchase i've made thus far.
